details.SLURM: The script uses SLURM to manage the job. It sets parameters for job name, requeue, number of nodes, CPU per task, partition, QoS, time, memory and output/error files.
details.CPU: The script allocates one core per MATLAB session.
details.Memory: The script sets the memory per CPU to 32000MB. It also provides options for different memory allocations.
details.Disk: The script uses the disk to store and retrieve data files, log files, and the MATLAB executable.
